text: `` In a project they documented in Why Muslim Integration Fails in Christian-Heritage Societies , IPL co-director David Laitin , IPL faculty affiliate Claire Adida , and Marie-Anne Valfort trace the roots of this failed integration in France and across Europe more broadly . ''
